attributes.action: reverse the decision to remove Phil Gooding as manager of the Financial Inquiries team.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: ONS Senior Management have decided, in their wisdom, that Phil Gooding should be moved sideways from his position as D2 within the Pensions and Insurance Inquiry division. These are such high profile inquiries, due to the importance to the UK economy of the figures they provide. The risk posed to the quality of data we provide is immeasurable. I implore all those who are concerned about the quality of Pensions Fund and Insurance data to join me in this petition, that we might forward it to Senior Management.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
